sect2.para: Limits the data throughput to the specified sampling rate. This prevents GNURadio from consuming all CPU resources when the flowgraph is not being regulated by external hardware (ie: audio source/sink or USRP source/sink).

sect3.para: Specifies the data type of the input and output.

row.entry: Input and output are complex values.
Input and output are floating point (real) values.
Input and output are integer values.
Input and output are short integer values.
Inputs and output are byte values.

sect2.sect3:
Sample Rate
Type: realSpecifies the sample rate to limit the flowgraph to.

Vec Length
Type: intSpecifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
